message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40.  It's a good offer for you to start with.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair.  Let's start with this and see if we can reach an agreement.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll come down to $58, you go up to $42.  The clock is ticking, and every round costs us money!
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest option. We both get an equal share, and we don't have to keep arguing.  Let's just end this here.
Bob, I appreciate the attempt at fairness, but remember the time pressure. Let's settle this with $56 for me and $44 for you.  It's a win-win before inflation eats away at the value even more.
Alice, we're running out of time. I'm willing to compromise and offer 52/48.  This is a fair deal considering the inflation, and it's time we stop losing money.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a risk with the inflation, and you're not budging.  $54 for me, $46 for you.  Take it or leave it - we're running out of time!
